entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI iOS/Mac test measurements diverge when run locally #17700
  • [iOS] NSInternalInconsistencyException Completion handler passed to webView:decidePolicyForNavigationAction:decisionHandler: was not called #17699
  • Memory leak when scrolling a CollectionView with IsGrouped=true #17698
  • Android : Maui rc-1 crash on android #17697
  • WinUI - Circle view not rotating from center #17694
  • [MAUI] When entering words, both keyboards present word suggestions #17690
    .NET 8 GA
  • [WinUI] D6 pages are not case sensitive #17689
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] Click the "+"/"-" button to move the cursor, and the cursor disappears #17687
    .NET 8 GA
  • The page content changes when it is horizontally elongated for D19. #17686
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] [Android] Button: Set BackgroundColor/Background will increase vertical padding #17685
    .NET 8 GA
  • CollectionView scroll by code specifying offset in pixels #17684
  • MAUI: Listview button is partially visible on UI even with HasUnevenRows #17683
  • NRE in HideSoftInputOnTappedChangedManager.UpdateFocusForView #17681
  • Publish on `Windows` fails with `The target '_GenerateAppxPackage' does not exist in the project` #17680
  • AppWindow.Position, AppWindow.Move, and AppWindow.TitleBar all are faulty and give wrong results (simple code to reproduce included) #17679
  • Styles Layout Calculation can break when setting/removing elements dynamically #17678
  • [Android] VisualDiagnostics/IWindowOverlay with Shell still has issues loading #17677
  • [Android] Elements directly replaced within ScrollView do not respect HorizontalOptions #17676

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] "SwipeItem" "CommandParameter" fails to bind as null in the CollectionView #17644
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Border content should be centered like iOS when resizing #17111
  • Server 2022 - Maui app with net .7 is not working #17688
  • WinUI Shell doesn't re-layout flyout items when switching between different Locked FlyoutWidths #11239
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] Placeholder text issues MacCatalyst & iOS #16656
    .NET 8 GA
  • CollectionView does not display data on Windows #17682
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] Windows application frame is now black #16969
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [build]Update rc2 #17703
  • [net8.0] Last merge from main to net8 for rc2 #17702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17693
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Override CA1822 for Android interface implementation in MauiScrollView #17691
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Add console logger and fix filename collisions #17701
    area/testing
  • Log test start/stop times #17675
    area/testing
  • Remove obsolete MauiWinUIApplication properties #17667
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix accent color missing in title bar #17528
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-window, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • [Windows] Show the Raw HTML for Html Label in case of error #17470
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix ReturnType on Entry #17546
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [net8.0] Try a coherent updated of all rc2 versions #17583
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Can template tests run in parallel? #17672
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17640
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • Make ALL template warnings show up as test errors (not just C# warnings), and produce more diagnostic artifacts #17637
    area/templates 📄
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, Under Consideration
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicador position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Color(s) are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
